channel.title: Help me plox.. clickable interfaces

item.title: Help me plox.. clickable interfaces
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

on my server i have this void

public void WriteWildyLevel()
{
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(147);
sendQuest("SPECIAL ON", 14655);
sendQuest("SPECIAL OFF", 14656);
sendQuest("|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||", 14657);
}

yeh i know thats the player controls interface, i was using it for a test.

but the interface isnt clickable in the spot it showes up on the game screen.
is there a way to make it clickable?
and the interface im using for my special buttons is 14654.
i have a spec bar in the attack interface set up to test specs, BUT i cant have them all becuase for some reason they lag my server.
so i made this interface spec bar and toggle. is there anyway to make it clickable?
BTW if you dont get what im saying, get on my server and youâ€™ll see.
its up.

Read full topic
